# VibeGate Roadmap

## v0.x

- Profiles for targeted gating (e.g., fast/strict, CI/local).
- Plugin system for adding custom checks and output emitters.
- Optional monitor mode for periodic gate runs against a repo.
- Optional local-model prompt translator separated from core gating logic.

## v1.0

- Stable plugin API and compatibility guarantees.
- First-class profile catalog with composable rulesets.
- Observability hooks for structured evidence ingestion.
- Expanded remediation workflows with verified Fix Packs.
